narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Pinnacle Treatment Centers In-i, LLC is a Clinic/Center, Rehabilitation, Substance Use Disorder provider based in Martinsville, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $20.8M in Medicaid payments across 58K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $20.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
